articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Apple pushed hard by EU to make iOS and iPadOS more interoperable - The Verge
articles.description: The European Union has prompted Apple to improve how its proprietary iOS tech works with competitors, sparking concerns about user privacy from the iPhone maker.
articles.content:
Apple pushed hard by EU to make iOS and iPadOS more interoperable
Apple pushed hard by EU to make iOS and iPadOS more interoperable
 / The iPhone maker says the EUs request to open up to competitor… [+3360 chars]
